TITLE: Why half of all workers may struggle to get weight-loss drug health insurance coverage
SUMMARY: Small businesses employ half of American workers but the jobs often lack the health insurance coverage that big corporations offer, including weight loss drugs.

TITLE: You could score a tax break for hiring your own kids this summer — if you follow the rules
SUMMARY: Hiring your kids can offer tax benefits if you're self-employed. But first, you need to understand your state and federal labor and tax laws.

TITLE: How Baked by Melissa's founder turned a tiny New York City apartment kitchen business into a cupcake empire
SUMMARY: Baked by Melissa founder Melissa Ben-Ishay explains how she built her cupcake empire from subway order dashing to a following of millions on social media.

TITLE: Inflation fears among America's small businesses are rising again and their faith in the Fed is falling
SUMMARY: Small business owners say the economy is doing okay, but their inflation fears are rising again while their faith in the Fed is dropping.

SUMMARY: Small business owners across the country say a 2024 economy and stock market that have been chugging along have left them behind.

SUMMARY: Successful start-up founders offer advice for aspiring entrepreneurs.

TITLE: Small business optimism hits 11-year low as inflation fears won't go away
SUMMARY: The NFIB's survey showed a reading of 88.5, down nearly a point from February to the lowest since December 2012.

TITLE: The Taylor Swift economy has reached every town in America, from small business moms to skating rinks and sushi bars
SUMMARY: The Taylor Swift economy is in GDP and inflation everywhere Eras tour went nationally and globally. In towns across the US, there's also a booming microeconomy.

TITLE: A majority of America's small business owners support minimum wage increase, even as they worry about worker affordability
SUMMARY: Many states and cities are raising their minimum wage, and most small business owners agree with it, according to new CNBC|SurveyMonkey data.

TITLE: Economic confidence among small business owners hits highest level since Biden took office
SUMMARY: President Biden's approval ratings among small business owners remain low and entrepreneurs are far from rosy in their economic outlook, but confidence is up.

SUMMARY: Amid the backdrop of Black Wall Street, groups are coming together to help uplift the next generation.

TITLE: Main Street is more optimistic this year even as inflation persists, survey says
SUMMARY: Small business optimism is rising, and owners are feeling better about the economy, even as inflation continues to pose challenges, the survey found.

TITLE: IRS unveils ‘voluntary disclosure program’ for businesses duped by pandemic-era tax credit
SUMMARY: The IRS has unveiled a "voluntary disclosure program" for businesses that claimed a pandemic-era tax credit in error and want to pay the money back.

TITLE: Biden touts minority small business wins as Latino approval sags
SUMMARY: A recent CNBC survey found that Republican front-runner Donald Trump has a 5-point lead against Biden among Latinos.

TITLE: IRS rejects more than 20,000 refund claims for pandemic-related tax credit
SUMMARY: The IRS is sending more than 20,000 rejection letters to taxpayers who wrongly claimed the employee retention tax credit. Here's what filers need to know.

TITLE: Supreme Court hears tax case on 'income': It may 'have the biggest fiscal policy effects of any court decision,' expert says
SUMMARY: The Supreme Court on Tuesday is hearing oral arguments for Moore v. United States, a case that could affect broad swaths of the U.S. tax code.

SUMMARY: Add Main Street business owners to Americans not buying President Biden's economic message with his approval among small business owners at a new low.

TITLE: It's TikTok Shop's first Christmas, and shoppers are torn between hot deals and ethics
SUMMARY: As consumers head into the holiday season, a new e-commerce platform has entered the playing field: TikTok Shop.

TITLE: IRS delays tax reporting rule change for business payments on apps such as Venmo and PayPal
SUMMARY: If you received business payments via apps such as PayPal and Venmo, you will not be subject to a lower threshold for 1099-K tax reporting for 2023.

TITLE: More part-time workers to get access to employer retirement plans next year
SUMMARY: Changes in the federal law, coupled with a strong labor market and state mandates are opening up employer-sponsored retirement plans to part-time workers.

SUMMARY: Software vendors that serve small and medium-sized businesses have gotten hammered by investors recently due to concerning forecasts

SUMMARY: Critical health insurance coverage decisions for the self-employed and their families need to be made now.

SUMMARY: Amazon is big business for many e-commerce entrepreneurs, but the costs and competition are complex, as the FTC case highlights.

SUMMARY: More state-mandated minimum wage hikes are coming in 2024, and many Main Street businesses may feel the pinch.

SUMMARY: $100 billion in residential real estate commissions paid by American homebuyers and sellers every year is up for grabs as legal pressures mount.

SUMMARY: America is experiencing a small business boom. SBA loans for minority entrepreneurs are a bigger part of the story.

SUMMARY: Amazon is rolling out its first buy now, pay later checkout option for small business owners via fintech player Affirm, CNBC has learned.

SUMMARY: The Fed held rates steady at its FOMC meeting, but small business owners are struggling to access capital, and credit card usage is rising.
